modName: How are the kids - Mjoll the Lioness - Hearthfire fix
summary: You married Mjoll and adopted a child/children. You ask her "How are the kids?". Then you build a house and move there. But now you can't ask Mjoll about your children anymore! This is a simple fix. Now if you decide to live in one of the Hearthfire houses the dialogue option "How are the kids?" will appear properly.
descriptionHtml: You married Mjoll and adopted a child/children. You ask her "How are the kids?". Then you build a house and move there. But now you can't ask Mjoll about your children anymore! This is a simple fix. Now if you decide to live in one of the Hearthfire houses the dialogue option "How are the kids?" will appear properly.
author: Fylkir
